tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE demography_data (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   age INT,
   location VARCHAR(50),
   gender VARCHAR(10),
   income DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    trend_type VARCHAR(255),
    trend_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(50),
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 location VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE age_statistics (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 age_group VARCHAR(20),
 total_population INT,
 median_income DECIMAL(10, 2));

CREATE TABLE location_data (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 location_name VARCHAR(100),
 city VARCHAR(50),
 state VARCHAR(50),
 country VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE demographic_trends (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 age_group VARCHAR(20),
 location_id UUID,
 total_population INT,
 median_income DECIMAL(10, 2));
CREATE TABLE demographics (id INT, age INT, location TEXT);
CREATE TABLE customers (id INT, name TEXT, age INT, location TEXT, occupation TEXT);
CREATE TABLE purchases (id INT, customer_id INT, purchase_date DATE, amount DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE TABLE locations (id INT, location_name TEXT, country TEXT, region TEXT);
CREATE TABLE age_groups (id INT, group_name TEXT, min_age INT, max_age INT);
